description:
__Driver Pack Solution Online__ is the online version of the most powerful manager for automated driver installation. Scans your computer hardware and offers a download from the Internet for all unidentified drivers, saving the frustration of googling everything manually.

###Warning

This driver pack contains unverified drivers from a third party source. Do not install this pack unless you explicitly want to.
Many anti-virus programs classify this driver pack as a [potentially unwanted program](https://www.virustotal.com/file/544af50f42dea8a2d459d00aca344bd549374577d1d78d91e2a28a4ef91d1bc3/analysis/1486089104/).

You have been warned.
summary: Scan your computer hardware and find all hardware drivers you need.
author: Artur Kuzyakov
